lyrics:
(Look at me and love again)
我們在炎熱與抑鬱的夏天　無法停止抽煙
(Look at me and love again)
我們在炎熱與抑鬱的辦公室　無法停止寫詩
(Fiction said that let me down)

(What you said that what's in my hand)

(da da da, da da da)

(I can see that love again)
我們是香港最後一群缺乏社交技巧的詩人
(You can see the love in my hand)

(I can say that love is blind)

(I don't care if love is blind)
在同樣不仁慈的善良與邪惡之間　與潮人抗衡

(da da da, da da da)

我們在嶺南之風　美孚之巔
(I can't change the world)
在公園　電影院　商場
送別所有成長的記憶
(I don't care about --)
我們喝著涼茶聽著音樂
(Love me is right)
大口大口地把煙噴到天上
(I don't see a thing)
日出日落　我們如在巴黎法國

(I can see the love is gone)
我們在炎熱與抑鬱的夏天　無法停止抽煙
(I don't care the love you are)
我們在炎熱與抑鬱的辦公室　無法停止寫詩
(You can say that love is true)
(I think she let it down)

(da da da, da da da)

(I can't be that lonely again)
(We can't change the world)
(I can't see that love in my hand)
(I can't change the world)
